name: Only One Cell
description:
Only One Cell is a game created by Jake Miller and Nicole Magerko for the 2019 Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam. It was inspired by the idea of beginning as an organism with only one cell and evolving (Pokemon-style) to eventually become a super-intelligent god-like being.

It didn't quite get there, but we had a lot of fun and learned a lot. Enjoy!

Credits:

Music by Eric Matyas - www.soundimage.org
